thread.title: BREAKING: Houston Hospital on Lockdown After Reports of Shots Fired
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Houston Hospital on Lockdown After Reports of Shots Fired

author: Ken Meyer
title: BREAKING: Houston Hospital on Lockdown After Reports of Shots Fired
text:
BREAKING: Houston Hospital on Lockdown After Reports of Shots Fired by Ken Meyer | 3:47   
Houston police have assembled outside of Ben Taub Hospital this afternoon due to reports of gunshots in or around the building. 
KPRC reports that at 2 p.m. local time, the hospital went into lockdown, and SWAT team officers were dispatched to the scene. Workers and patients have been evacuated from the hospital, and the scene is still observing a heavy police presence. 
This story is developing, and we will update accordingly. 
Watch aerial footage above, via KHOU . 
UPDATE – 3:50 p.m. EST: Fox News reports that the shots were first heard around the hopistal’s trauma center Breaking News: Ben Taub Hospital in Houston is on lockdown after reports of a shooting. pic.twitter.com/2Vb2IL19Gt 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 21, 2017 
It is currently unknown whether anyone was injured as a result of this incident. 
[image via screengrab]
